title: How to get past "Verify PIN" during setup after a reset
content: No matter what option I choose, whether it's to enter my old PIN, or use my google account instead, it returns to the copy apps & data screen. Obviously, since this was a reset, I don't have data from an old phone to transfer. And any time I tap "Don't copy" "Can't use old phone?" or "No cable?" brings me to the Verify PIN screen.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3 XL
